title: Shaco Clone Detonation
body:
Just like the title reads, I think it would be a really cool idea for players to be able to control when the {{champion:35}} Hallucinate Clone detonates, instead of when it's duration wears out, or is killed. (Like maybe double/triple tap your ultimate while the clone is up to trigger the detonation) Any thoughts? 

Edit: I like Felvyne idea to use his E on the clone to detonate it and trigger the explosion and deal increased damage :P

Activation needs working on, I know I personally rapidly tap R to control where the clone walks.
or self cast the clone to make it detonate.
I'd like shaco to keep his ult in the rework but get finetuned (it can q stealth for jukes, throw a slowing shiv, place a fake box, etc)
I actually like this idea. I feel like Shaco is super diverse in his mid-game and this could really affect plays.
What if you could cast your ult on an ally, giving them the momentary vanish and reappear with a double. but had your stats still. That is some diverse game play options right there.
Either this or at least some indication of when he's gonna die. If he has it I haven't noticed
What you're describing would kinda take away from how it works now, for better or worse. Proccing it with E would be interesting though.

Why not add a new button functionality, so that we can control more than 1 unit in league?

Like Alt + R for shaco to move all units.

Or Alt + Right Click, something like that.

Have the R itself do something with the pet, like clone explosion or Tibbers aura radiation.
I would say throw the E to the clone for detonating him, since all the key combinations with only R would be easily a missclick.
This is even better Idea shaco being able to cast E on to his clone instead of his opponent for a nice aoe explosion (maybe to deal increase damage)

It would then need a serious damage nerf to keep it balanced. 

While I don't play Shaco, doesn't the current version fit more with his theme. He has to trick his enemy into attacking his clone or using AOE near it for it to go off.
AP Shaco clone + AP Zilean bomb = RIP
